page.title: 09ATTITUDES IN BARNOLDSWICK
page.content: We surveyed some of the people in Barnoldswick to find out what they thought of living in the town. Most of those we asked liked living here and the main reasons they gave were:-1.The town is small and friendly. 2.It is surrounded by lovely countryside. 3.The shops are within walking distance. 4.It is not far to the coast. 5. Bigger shopping centres are not far away. Our survey found that a greater proportion of older people liked living here than did younger people. The reasons for disliking Barnoldswick were:-1. Not enough for people to do- especially youngsters. 2. Not very many good shops. 3. It is too small. 4. The rainy weather.
